verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, the \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* of a \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w attend|strong="H7181"\w* to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*.
For I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w doctrine|strong="H3948"\w*, \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* ye not my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

For I was my \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w tender|strong="H7390"\w* and \w only|strong="H3173"\w* \add beloved\add* in the \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* of my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.

He \w taught|strong="H3384"\w* me also, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Let thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w retain|strong="H8551"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w Get|strong="H7069"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w get|strong="H7069"\w* \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*: \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \add it\add* not; neither \w decline|strong="H5186"\w* from the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.
\w Forsake|strong="H5800"\w* her not, and she shall \w preserve|strong="H8104"\w* thee: \w love|strong="H0157"\w* her, and she shall \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* thee.

\w Wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \add is\add* the principal \w thing|strong="H7225"\w*; \add therefore\add* \w get|strong="H7069"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*: and with all thy \w getting|strong="H7075"\w* get \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*.
\w Exalt|strong="H5549"\w* her, and she shall \w promote|strong="H7311"\w* thee: she shall bring thee to \w honour|strong="H3513"\w*, when thou dost \w embrace|strong="H2263"\w* her.

She shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to thine \w head|strong="H7218"\w* an \w ornament|strong="H3880"\w* of \w grace|strong="H2580"\w*: a \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* of \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* shall she \w deliver|strong="H4042"\w* to thee.\f + \fr 4.9 \ft a crown…: or, she shall compass thee with a crown of glory\f*

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* my \w sayings|strong="H0561"\w*; and the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of thy \w life|strong="H2416"\w* shall be \w many|strong="H7235"\w*.
I have \w taught|strong="H3384"\w* thee in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*; I have \w led|strong="H1869"\w* thee in \w right|strong="H3476"\w* \w paths|strong="H4570"\w*.

When thou \w goest|strong="H3212"\w*, thy \w steps|strong="H6806"\w* shall not be \w straitened|strong="H3334"\w*; and when thou \w runnest|strong="H7323"\w*, thou shalt not \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w*.

Take fast \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* of \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*; let \add her\add* not \w go|strong="H7503"\w*: \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* her; for she \add is\add* thy \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

¶ \w Enter|strong="H0935"\w* not into the \w path|strong="H0734"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, and \w go|strong="H0833"\w* not in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add men\add*.
\w Avoid|strong="H6544"\w* it, \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* not by it, \w turn|strong="H7847"\w* from it, and pass \w away|strong="H5674"\w*.

For they \w sleep|strong="H3462"\w* not, except they have done \w mischief|strong="H7489"\w*; and their \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* is taken \w away|strong="H1497"\w*, unless they cause \add some\add* to \w fall|strong="H3782"\w*.
For they \w eat|strong="H3898"\w* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* of \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*.

But the \w path|strong="H0734"\w* of the \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \add is\add* as the \w shining|strong="H5051"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, that \w shineth|strong="H0215"\w* \w more|strong="H1980"\w* and more unto the \w perfect|strong="H3559"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add is\add* as \w darkness|strong="H0653"\w*: they \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not at what they \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w*.
¶ My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w attend|strong="H7181"\w* to my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*; \w incline|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* unto my \w sayings|strong="H0561"\w*.
Let them not \w depart|strong="H3868"\w* from thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*; \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* them in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

For they \add are\add* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* unto those that \w find|strong="H4672"\w* them, and \w health|strong="H4832"\w* to all their \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.\f + \fr 4.22 \ft health: Heb. medicine\f*

¶ \w Keep|strong="H5341"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* with all \w diligence|strong="H4929"\w*; for out of it \add are\add* the \w issues|strong="H8444"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.\f + \fr 4.23 \ft with…: Heb. above all keeping\f*

Put \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from thee a \w froward|strong="H6143"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w perverse|strong="H3891"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* put \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from thee.\f + \fr 4.24 \ft a froward…: Heb. frowardness of mouth and perverseness of lips\f*
Let thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w look|strong="H5027"\w* right \w on|strong="H5227"\w*, and let thine \w eyelids|strong="H6079"\w* look \w straight|strong="H3474"\w* before thee.

\w Ponder|strong="H6424"\w* the \w path|strong="H4570"\w* of thy \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and let all thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* be \w established|strong="H3559"\w*.\f + \fr 4.26 \ft let…: or, all thy ways shall be ordered aright\f*
\w Turn|strong="H5186"\w* not to the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* nor to the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*: \w remove|strong="H5493"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* from \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.
